mapper.select:
select
from jy_unload_vehicle_board where board_code = #{boardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 order by create_time desc limit 1

select
from jy_unload_vehicle_board where unload_vehicle_biz_id = #{unloadVehicleBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and board_code = #{boardCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 limit 1

select unload_vehicle_biz_id,start_site_id,start_site_name,end_site_id,end_site_name,goods_area_code, count(board_code) board_code_num from jy_unload_vehicle_board where yn = 1 and unload_vehicle_biz_id = #{bizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY end_site_id
select from jy_unload_vehicle_board where yn = 1 and unload_vehicle_biz_id = #{unloadVehicleBizId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
